Name: Outlaws: Corwin's Treasure
About the game: Unlock the mystery behind the story of the famed bandit Corwin in this thrilling hidden object adventure! A unique story with realistic atmosphere in a rustic wild west setting. Find hidden objects and play challenging mini games to find a long forgotten treasure. A week ago, you received an invitation to visit the old abandoned town of St. Martica by Mr. John Atkins, a rich businessman who promised to share a recent and significant Mayan archeological discovery! Being a historian, you found this opportunity too good to pass. However, when you reached the town, the truth of the situation unraveled when your wife was kidnapped! Now, you are forced to help Atkins and his gang in their quest for the famed Corwinâ€™s Treasure.
